profile.name: Mikel Lindsaar
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | StoreConnect, MetaPulse, reinteractive
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with over a decade of experience in Ruby on Rails and AWS. Proven track record of delivering scalable and efficient solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple high-traffic e-commerce platforms using Ruby on Rails and AWS.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Ruby on Rails, including a distributed social networking platform.
Provided technical expertise to clients in the e-commerce and finance industries.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open source projects, including Ruby on Rails gems and AWS-related tools.
Contributed to the development of several high-profile projects in the Ruby on Rails community.

experience.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Ruby on Rails, including a high-traffic e-commerce platform.
Collaborated with clients to design and implement custom solutions using Ruby on Rails.

experience.title: Ruby on Rails Intern
description: Gained hands-on experience with Ruby on Rails development, including working on small projects and contributing to open source gems.
